recipe.title: Spicy Slow Cooker BBQ Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; chipotle pepper, canned and diced ; (50 g)
2 lb ; pork shoulder, or pork butt ; (910 g)
½ lb ; baby back ribs ; (225 g)

steps.step: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients for the sweet ‘n’ spicy sauce.
In a slow cooker, place all protein and pour sauce over until evenly coated.
On high, cook for 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours.
Portion any meat with a side of veggies and the spicy sauce.
